cast.overview: A chronicle of the life of Louis Zamperini, an Olympic runner who was taken prisoner by Japanese forces during World War II.
cast.title: Unbroken

details.biography:
Yutaka Izumihara is an actor and stunt performer. Born in 1970, lives and works in Australia.

At the age of 19, he decided to become an international actor and moved to Sydney. After graduating from Wollongong University in Australia, he is one of the few Japan actors currently based in Australia. He appeared in "Superman Returns" and worked as an actor and war coordinator on "The Pacific," executive produced by Steven Spielberg and Tom Hanks.
details.name: Yutaka Izumihara
